thumb.title: Smash Remix [TAS] - Hyper Sonic Remix Mode (Very Hard, No Damage)
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2F6SSnhqVCoSmash Remixのパッチ先https://github.com/JSsixtyfour/smashremix/releases以下説明文I have no idea if this color was based off the white Chaos Emerald, but it's the closest thing to Hyper Sonic so we're rocking it.They done gave this man some new special moves: a pseudo-shine, up to THREE teleports, and straight up FLIGHT. On some DBZ type ish for real.If this gets 100 likes, I'll do an All Star run (much like I'll be doing with Crash and Peach because ya'll killed it over there, so thanks for the support!)Air Dodge: Air DashJab LockPerfect ShieldingFast Fall AerialSpot DodgingWall TechingChargable Smash AttacksSpecial Zoom: Match End NEW DISCLAIMER: This is a tool-assisted superplay (TAS). What that means is that this playthrough was done using save states and precise frame by frame control, performing every input exactly as desired, then playing back the same input stream at 60 fps. Follow me on twitch!: https://www.twitch.tv/perfectrusherEnjoyed the video? Subscribe for more!Thanks for watching!

tags.tag: ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ
